attr.title: Hatchwell
attr.desc: A top-down action RPG set in a day in a town called Hatchwell. Join the townspeople as they prepare for the Hatchwell Festival! A day celebrating the peace brought by a heroâ€™s bravery a hundred years ago.
attr.inst: Purchase the game from steam. Download the game and place the game files in ports/hatchwell/gamedata
